body.name: Classic Retro Game Console with 777 Video Games,AV and HDMI HD Output, Plug and Play, Classic Edition Mini Entertainment System Adults and Kid
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 42 mins
features: Isn’t childhood a wonderful time?Childhood memories are precious When you look back at yours,you’re bound to have memories of playing classic video games with your childhood friends.let classic games bring back that childhood joy.
777 Preloaded Classic Games:This retro gaming system comes with 777 preloaded games,including all your favorites such as action,puzzles, sports,fighting and racing.

Easy to Setup and Support AV and HDMI port:These old-school video game systems with a plug-and-play system that doesn’t require an internet connection or insert cards. The console is easy to connect to your old TV via AV or HDMI ports and is ready to keep you entertained! Note that the image quality of these classic games may not be as clear as today's HD games.

Best father-son Gift:Is it hard to Strengthen a Father-Son Relationship?Not.Through this retro game console,you can take a few moments to be together, laugh, have fun, and get to know one another a little better. Be your children's best friends! You can also give your dad this retro gaming console as a surprise gift to let him relive the happy childhood memories!
Excellent Customer Service：We offer good products and follow them up with excellent customer service. Don`t hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blast from the past
reviews.reviewText: Love this blast from the past. My kids like it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Blast from the past.
reviews.reviewText: My husband enjoyed playing the games from when he was a kid but he hated that it did not safe his level in the game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this item as a christmas gift for a family member. After searching and comparing similar products we chose this one specifically because it was described as having “777” games compared to the 620 games most of the others had. We paid extra shipping to ensure its arrival in time for the holiday only to receive it and find out that it has 620 games like all of the rest of them. Disappointed that the item does not have the additional games as advertised and that we essentially wasted money on shipping that we could have saved if we had order this same product from a different seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small little thing!
reviews.reviewText: This device is very small, and it has nice games. However, you can’t save your progress. Great for parties and small children, but if you want to save your progress, keep lookin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We received this an unfortunately one of the colors was not working. I reached out to the company and they replaced the controller with in a few days! It's super fun and full of classic games. Easy to set up as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does this console have super Mario?? So far can’t seem to find it. Box didn’t have a list

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did what it claimed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This system kept my nephew entertained for an afternoon
reviews.reviewText: You are getting tons of games for the price, the game select menu and switching in between games is not really a smooth feature with this device. Would be nice if it came with and HDMI cord so you can buy the one product and actually hook it up to the TV.
